recipe.title: Espresso Sambuca Ice-Cream Soda
ingredients: 1 teaspoon instant espresso powder dissolved in 2 tablespoons hot water and cooled
2 ounces (1/4 cup) sambuca, or to taste
2 tablespoons finely chopped chocolate-covered espresso beans
instructions: With a small ice-cream scoop or spoon, divide ice cream between 2 chilled stemmed glasses. Add espresso mixture, Sambuca and club soda and top with espresso beans.
